statements: SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_name, location, is_armed FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_name, trigger_event FROM smart_home_devices WHERE is_armed = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices WHERE location = 'Living Room';
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM smart_home_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices WHERE is_armed = TRUE;
SELECT device_name, location FROM smart_home_devices WHERE trigger_event = 'motion detected';
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices WHERE location = 'Living Room' AND is_armed = TRUE;
SELECT device_name, trigger_event FROM smart_home_devices WHERE is_armed = FALSE ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(device_id) AS total_devices FROM smart_home_devices WHERE is_armed = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM security_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM security_devices ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM security_devices WHERE device_type = 'Camera';
SELECT * FROM security_triggers WHERE trigger_type = 'Motion Sensor';
SELECT device_id, device_name, installed_location FROM security_devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM security_devices WHERE device_type = 'Camera';
SELECT device_name, installed_location FROM security_devices WHERE firmware_version LIKE '1.%';
SELECT device_name, firmware_version FROM security_devices WHERE device_id > 5 ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_triggers WHERE trigger_type = 'Motion' AND trigger_condition LIKE '%movement%';
SELECT device_name, firmware_version, installed_location FROM security_devices WHERE device_id IN (4, 6, 8) ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_name, location FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT * FROM security_triggers WHERE trigger_type = 'motion';
SELECT device_name, action_name FROM smart_home_devices, security_actions WHERE smart_home_devices.device_id = security_actions.device_id;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_name, location FROM smart_home_devices ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'Light';
SELECT * FROM security_triggers INNER JOIN smart_home_devices ON security_triggers.device_id = smart_home_devices.device_id;
SELECT trigger_name, trigger_type, action_name FROM security_triggers INNER JOIN security_actions ON security_triggers.trigger_id = security_actions.action_id;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM smart_home_devices WHERE room_id = 2;
SELECT device_name, status FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'light';
SELECT * FROM triggers WHERE action = 'notify';
SELECT device_id, trigger_type, trigger_condition FROM triggers WHERE trigger_type = 'motion';
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM smart_home_devices WHERE room_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, status FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'Light';
SELECT room_name, COUNT(device_id) AS num_devices FROM smart_home_devices INNER JOIN rooms ON smart_home_devices.room_id = rooms.room_id GROUP BY room_name;
SELECT device_name, trigger_type, action FROM smart_home_devices INNER JOIN triggers ON smart_home_devices.device_id = triggers.device_id WHERE triggers.trigger_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM smart_home_devices WHERE location = 'Living Room';
SELECT device_name FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'Smart Thermostat';
SELECT device_name, location FROM smart_home_devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'Light';
SELECT device_name, location FROM smart_home_devices WHERE location LIKE '%Living Room%';
SELECT t.trigger_name, a.action_name FROM trigger_devices t JOIN trigger_actions ta ON t.trigger_id = ta.trigger_id JOIN security_actions a ON ta.action_id = a.action_id;

SELECT u.user_name, s.device_name, s.location FROM user_permissions up JOIN smart_home_devices s ON up.device_id = s.device_id JOIN trigger_devices td ON s.device_id = td.device_id JOIN trigger_actions ta ON td.trigger_id = ta.trigger_id JOIN security_actions sa ON ta.action_id = sa.action_id;
